titles.title: 587 Source Of My Spirit's Deep Desire (easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Source of my spirit's
Deep desire
For living joys that
Shall not perish
The patient hope
Thy words inspire
Still let Thy tender
Mercy cherish

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
On Thee my humbled
Soul would wait
Her utmost weakness
Calmly learning
And see Thy grace its
Way create
Through thorns and briers
Which Thou art burning

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Gladly my inmost
Heart would know
The love that now it
Faintly traces
And see the streams from
Zion flow
O'er all its waste
And desert places

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And still I hope
O not in vain
I know this holy
Seed possessing
Thou wilt come down
Like gentle rain
And make the barren
Ground a blessing
